name: Air Fryer Brussels Sprouts
author: Bren
summary: Sweet and tart balsamic vinegar pairs well with the bitterness of Brussels sprouts; the bacon adds a smokey flavor. After 10 minutes, there's still some bite to the sprouts; add a few more minutes for a softer texture, if desired.
ingredients: 10 ounces Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved lengthwise
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine oil, salt, and pepper in a bowl and mix well
Add Brussels sprouts and turn to coat
Air fry for 5 minutes, shake the sprouts, and cook for an additional 5 minutes
Transfer sprouts to a serving dish and sprinkle with balsamic vinegar; turn to coat
